resources.string: Dis Konto isch nöd markiert oder gschperrt. Alles isch OK!

string.name: engineMarked
string.comment:
This denotes that the player's account is marked for cheating, specifically for using external assistance.
Please note that while the key is 'engineMarked', Lichess has a wider definition of what constitutes 'external assistance'. External assistance is usually relying on a chess engine, but it can also mean looking through opening lines, taking advice from a strong player, and more.

resources.string: Dis Konto isch wäge externer Underschtützig bim Schpille markiert.

Mir definiered das als d\'Verwändig vu externer Hilf, zum dis Wüsse und/oder dini Kobinationsfähigkeit z\'verschtärche und en Vorteil gägenüber dim Gegner z\'erlange. Witeri Einzelheite findsch uf de Site %s.
Dis Konto isch gschperrt für Spiel - Arenas.
Dis Konto isch gschperrt, für Turnier mit ächte Prise.
Dis Konto isch markiert wäge Wertigs - Manipulation.
Mir definiered das als absichtlichi Manipulation vu de Wertig, dur absichtlichs Verlüre vu Schpil oder dur Schpille gäge es anders Konto, wo ansichtlich Schpil verlürt.

string.name: accountMuted
string.comment: muted in the sense of: You cannot chat with your opponent anymore or post messages.

string.name: accountMutedInfo
string.comment: %s is "communication guidelines", which is a string separately available for translation.

resources.string: Lies euseri %s. D\'Nödihaltig vu de Kommunikationsrichtlinie chann dezue fühere, dass Konte schtumm g\'eschaltet werded.
Dis Konto isch vu de Beschtelischte usgschlosse.

string.name: excludedFromLeaderboardsInfo
string.comment: Follows the string excludedFromLeaderboards: "Your account has been excluded from leaderboards."

resources.string: Mir definiered das als es Usnütze vu jegliche unfaire Methode, zum uf d\'Beschtelischte zcho.
Dis Konto isch vu de Moderatore g\'schlosse worde.
Dini Tagebüecher (Blogs) händ d\'Moderatore unsichtbar g\'macht.

string.name: playTimeout
string.comment: play timeout = Lichess prevents you temporarily from playing any games

string.name: communicationGuidelines
string.comment:
Part of a longer sentence:
Read our communication guidelines. Failure to follow the communication guidelines can result in accounts being muted.
